summary:
Alright guys, it’s time for that game again. Let’s caption this! I’ll start:
My body while I’m trying to get out of bed to go to...
body:
Alright guys, it’s time for that game again. Let’s caption this! I’ll start:

My body while I’m trying to get out of bed to go to school at 6:00 AM after watching Netflix until 3:00 AM.

blog.name: marvelheroperil
blog.title: Marvel Superheroes in Peril
blog.description: This is a backup blog to the sideblog MarvelPeril in case it gets deactivated. This blog dedicates to Marvel superheroes falling into perilous situations such as getting captured, hurt or whatever. Note that there WON'T be any pictures of superheroes from live-action Marvel movies/TV Shows.

summary: I can’t wait until they eventually rehash MCU and all the original actors play the parental figures that inevitably die. Like,...
body:
I can’t wait until they eventually rehash MCU and all the original actors play the parental figures that inevitably die.

Like, watch Robert Downer Jr. be Howard Stark and Tom Holland be Uncle Ben and they just get killed.

blog.title: Brand New Wings
blog.description:
Anime • Marvel • Free spirit • Pan • Genderfluid • I'm Mim • 👌❤️

Taking writing requests!

summary:
Peter: If you’ve never played with a Lite-Brite growing up, you’re uncultured.
Steve: I don’t even know what that is.
Peter:...
body:
Peter: If you’ve never played with a Lite-Brite growing up, you’re uncultured.


Steve: I don’t even know what that is.


Peter: That is literally the worst thing you’ve ever said to me.

reblog.comment:
Peter: If you’ve never played with a Lite-Brite growing up, you’re uncultured.


Steve: I don’t even know what that is.


Peter: That is literally the worst thing you’ve ever said to me.

trail.content_raw:
Peter: If you’ve never played with a Lite-Brite growing up, you’re uncultured.


Steve: I don’t even know what that is.


Peter: That is literally the worst thing you’ve ever said to me.
trail.content:
Peter: If you’ve never played with a Lite-Brite growing up, you’re uncultured.


Steve: I don’t even know what that is.


Peter: That is literally the worst thing you’ve ever said to me.

blog.name: thecomicbookj
blog.title: Mr. J’s
blog.description:
NSFW

18 and up only.

I won’t be creating anymore porn for this page... but I still want nothing to do with children!

I am a Daddy/Dom

But I’m not your Daddy!

I will be using this page to continue growing with my lovely little girls

@i-am-dubs

@droppinby

I will be posting my work and pictures, but I hope I can be a more active member of this community as it struggles to stay afloat!

I may try my hand at writing...

Feel free to ask me anything or send submissions to entertain your favorite tumblr psychopath 😉

Thanks
